law.catch_line: Entomologist to issue certificate for stock free from insects and fungus.
law.text: When the state entomologist examines any trees, vines, plants or other nursery stock and finds the stock free from dangerously injurious insect and fungus enemies, he shall make out and deliver to the owner of the stock a certificate stating that he has inspected the stock and that he believes it to be free from dangerously injurious insect and fungus enemies. He shall keep in his office, for the information of anyone interested, copies of all valid certificates issued by him.
law.history: Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 1925a-5.
